snippet: Advocates of liberalized marijuana laws complained of a lack of details, like which hospitals would prescribe it and who would supply it.
abstract: Advocates of New York Gov Andrew Cuomo's liberalized medical marijuana laws complain of shortage of details; administration has yet to detail the 20 hospitals statewide where it will be available, in what forms it will be dispensed or where the state will get its supply.
lead_paragraph: Advocates of liberalized marijuana laws complained of a lack of details, like which hospitals would prescribe it and who would supply it.

headline.main: Even Supporters Question Cuomo’s Marijuana Plan
headline.print_headline: Even Supporters Question Cuomo’s Marijuana Plan
